subject: Overloading of vehicels for execution of project.
text: HTd 7elq TTH nrfar<uT PHONE 91-11.5074100/5074200 (73h 9a;7 37 Tomrff T7TTT) Fax 91-11-5080360/ 5080460 2223/23184/2468/2553 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport & Highways) G.5 SECTOR-10, OWARKA, NEW DELHI-110045 No. NHAVMisc/2003/Tech/CK 03.02.2004 CRRCULAR It has recently come to notice that one of the Contractors executing the widening and strengthening work under NHDP has requested the State Transport authorities for permission to carry excess load in vehicles to facilitate execution of the project. Hon'ble Minister  for Road Transport & Highways has viewed this matter seriously as such overloaded vehicles not only endanger the safety of other road users but also damage the precious road infrastructure It may be ensured that Contractors do not indulge in overloading of vehicles and also do not make any such requests to the State Govts. to allow overloading: (Nirmaljit Singh) Member (Tech) To AlI PIUs of Chennai-Kolkata and Delhi-Kolkata Section of GQ to 1_ Member (Admn) 2. Member (Finance) 3_ CGM(EW) 4 . CGM(NS) 5_ PS to Chairman Exo HuHA Copy
